title: #36: Edumacation (Jeremy Horwitz, David Taylor, Ari Shaffir)
itunes:title: Edumacation with Jeremy Horwitz and David Taylor
description: Jeremy Horwitz talked to David Taylor and I about his experiences as a college professor at Santa Clara. Obviously, I asked if he's ever had sex with a student. There's actually a lot more to the job than waiting for signals from sorority chicks.
